list.item: Integrate Git in their daily projects.

certificates.title: Modern JavaScript
certificates.subtitle: From the beginning
certificates.description: Learn and build projects with pure JavaScript. Start with the basic fundamentals and work to advanced programming WITHOUT relying on frameworks or libraries at all.

list.item: Basics & Fundamentals: Data types, let & const variables, functions, conditionals, loops, object literals, arrays, etc
DOM Manipulation: Selectors, traversing the DOM, show/hide, creating & removing elements, event listeners
OOP: ES5 prototypes, inheritance, ES2015 classes & sub-classes, constructors
Async JS: Ajax & XHR, Fetch API, callbacks, promises, async / await
ES2015+: Arrow functions, template strings, generators, iterators, maps & sets, symbols & more

certificates.title: 50 Projects In 50 Days
certificates.subtitle: - HTML, CSS & JavaScript
certificates.description: This is a purely project-based course. It is geared toward beginners, but intermediate developers can also enjoy creating new things. This course includes 50 mini projects in HTML, CSS & JavaScript that relate to the DOM (Document Object Model.

list.item: project based teaching to sharpen HTML, CSS & JavaScript skills
build unique projects in a short timeframe
modern styling with flexbox, CSS animations, custom properties, etc
DOM manipulation, events, array methods, HTTP requests & more

certificates.title: Adobe XD
certificates.subtitle: UI/UX Design, prototype, and handoff from scratch
certificates.description: Adobe XD is a powerful tool for UI/UX designers giving the power to design and prototype an entire app, all from one program. This course starts off with Adobe XD basics and quickly gets up to speed on designing and prototyping a full fledged app with amazing images, colors, and animations.

list.item: navigate around the interface and toggle on/off the panels
set up responsive art boards
convert icons and buttons into symbols to reuse across your entire project
prototyple, test, share projects, prototypes, and design assets
